name: Tito Double P
description: '''Jesús Roberto Laija García''', known professionally as '''Tito Double P''', is a Mexican rapper, singer and songwriter. He is best known as the cousin of fellow musician [[Peso Pluma]] and has written several songs within his discography. He released his debut studio album ''[[Incómodo]]'' (2024) on 22 August 2024, which debuted at number 20 on the US [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]].
